title: Hoax (book)
added: David Bauder of the Associated Press gives a positive review and notes that the most disturbing parts of the book don't rely on insider access, but rather are pulled directly from on air broadcasts, and the resulting  twitter feeds by Trump which very closely match the content of the broadcasts.   These examples demonstrate Trump's continuous reliance on the station to directly mold much of his political stance on a variety of issues.
